items.title: NPR and PBS in the Hot Seat, and a Rare Protest in Gaza
A Traditional Ramadan Treat Gets a Modern Remake (but Good Luck Getting It)
items.description: Marook, a sweet bread eaten during Ramadan in Syria, used to be a simple loaf, but now the list of choices can be as long as the lines of customers.
